Brian Hanson

Hi! I'm Brian.

I'm a developer currently working as a Principal developer at One Design Company in Chicago. I love to use technology to solve complex problems. I strive to be a “swiss army knife,” utilizing a myriad of skills to produce work that is not only functional but aesthetically pleasing, too. I believe in listening to gain a deeper understanding of the intended impact without forgetting how the end-user will engage with various touch points.
